title: Looking for a Team
body:
Hi,
My IGN is flamingsword2 and I am looking to join a ranked team.
I can play every role well with the exception of jungle.
My peak league was Silver 3, but has dropped down to Bronze 1 due to inactivity during Season 3 and 4.

My best champions are:
TOP: Anivia, Morgana
MID: Anivia, Morgana, Ahri, Twisted Fate
ADC: Vayne, Lucian, Sivir
SUP: Morgana, Janna, Sona
